fields.Title: KIM SWITCH / SAMARAN BUTTER
fields.Description: Kim asks you what you think might have happened at the canal.

fields.Title: START
input
You: ""Reckless traffic hooliganism.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Reckless traffic hooliganism."

fields.Title: You: ""Some top-shelf shenanigans. I want..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Some top-shelf shenanigans. I want to meet the driver and shake his hand."
fields.Alternate1: "Some top-shelf shenanigans. I want to meet the driver and shake her hand."

fields.Title: You: ""On second thought, maybe this does..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "On second thought, maybe this doesn't really warrant an investigation." [Leave.]

fields.Title: whohub
Kim Kitsuragi: ""The traffic hooliganism? I hope no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The traffic hooliganism? I hope not. Fortunately, we're not traffic cops. Should we get back to the murder?"

fields.Title: trafficcasehub
You: ""See, Kim, what happened here is --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "See, Kim, what happened here is -- the driver was a man whose wife was about to give birth..."

fields.Title: You: ""It had to be someone really cool a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It had to be someone really cool and courageous."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "I'm not expecting him to get far wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm not expecting him to get far with this, the lieutenant consoles himself.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're right." He straightens his..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right." He straightens his back. "Let's get back to the murder investigation."

fields.Title: You: ""Actually, never mind, I need more..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually, never mind, I need more evidence to come up with a list of suspects."

fields.Title: You: ""Let's move on. We've learned all w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's move on. We've learned all we can here." [Leave.]

!(Variable["canal.kim_samaran_volition"])
You: ""I believe it was a Linnea G22.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I believe it was a Linnea G22."

fields.Title: You: ""I have no idea.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have no idea."
fields.Alternate1: "I don't know, maybe a superstar mobile?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I suppose it's not really our job..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I suppose it's not really our job to figure that out."

fields.Title: You: ""I don't care and it's not really o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't care and it's not really our concern." [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: "That's okay, I love shit stories."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's okay, I love shit stories.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Well, you're in luck, then."
fields.Dialogue Text: Well, you're in luck, then.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I suppose that narrows it down som..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I suppose that narrows it down somewhat. Fortunately, we're not traffic cops. Should we get back to the murder?"

fields.Title: You: "Try to come up with a convincing ex..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Try to come up with a convincing explanation for the driver's actions.

You: ""After quitting in frustration, he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "After quitting in frustration, he became a recluse, a ghost-driver, searching for death on the streets of Revachol, speeding..."

fields.Title: Authority: "Shut *down*."
fields.Dialogue Text: Shut *down*.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He seems impressed. "That's quite l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He seems impressed. "That's quite likely, from what I can tell."

You: ""It was someone dangerous. Perhaps..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was someone dangerous. Perhaps this is somehow *connected* to the murder?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We're not traffic cops. Should we..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We're not traffic cops. Should we get back to the murder?"

Conceptualization: "Somewhere in the depths of your alc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Somewhere in the depths of your alcohol-addled soul, you find a few threads that you can weave into a story.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What kind of car do you think it w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What kind of car do you think it was?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He raises his eyebrows. "Oh?""
fields.Dialogue Text: He raises his eyebrows. "Oh?"

fields.Title: carmodelhub
You: ""I have some ideas about who it mig..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have some ideas about who it might have been."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""In conclusion -- it's a colourful..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "In conclusion -- it's a colourful theory, but I don't believe Jacob Irw did this. Should we go?"

fields.Title: You: ""I think it was a Coupris 40.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think it was a Coupris 40."

fields.Title: You: ""It looks like someone was in a rea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It looks like someone was in a real hurry."

fields.Title: You: ""He was out drinking with his pals..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He was out drinking with his pals when he got the news, and, flushed with paternal pride, he got into his Coupris at once and raced to the clinic..."
fields.Alternate1: "He was out drinking with his pals when he got the news, and, flushed with paternal pride, he got into his Linnea at once and raced to the clinic..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He sighs. "If we must.""
fields.Dialogue Text: He sighs. "If we must."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The TipTop Tournée champion?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The TipTop Tournée champion?"

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah, I have no idea. Who could it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, I have no idea. Who could it have been?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant shrugs. "We're not t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant shrugs. "We're not traffic cops. Should we get back to the murder?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, yes, that could very well hav..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, yes, that could very well have been it. Now let's move on. We're not traffic cops."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "You've thought of a very touching s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You've thought of a very touching story. It's shit, though.

fields.Title: You: ""No, we need to find this Jacob Irw..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, we need to find this Jacob Irw before tragedy strikes." (Take the task.)

fields.Title: Jump to: [trafficcasehub]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""... jumping canals at night?" He i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "... jumping canals at night?" He interrupts you. "If I was Jacob Irw I wouldn't drive in *Martinaise*. The roads are awful."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant patiently listens to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant patiently listens to the words coming from your mouth.

fields.Title: You: ""We should bring this driver to jus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We should bring this driver to justice." (Take the task.)

fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe I shouldn't tell it if it's shit.

fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, this is good, this is very good.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Nope, you're already telling it."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nope, you're already telling it.

fields.Title: Volition: "The urge is strong, but you are str..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The urge is strong, but you are stronger.

fields.Title: canalsignswitch
You: ""After the untimely death of dear f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "After the untimely death of dear friend and fellow racer Alfie Deletraz at Fjordhammer, Jacob Irw was desperately chasing death on the race track -- but death *eluded* him."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "No, it's shit."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, it's shit.

fields.Title: You: ""This could have only been..." (Pau..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This could have only been..." (Pause dramatically.) "... Jacob Irw."
